name: Robber Adventure
description:
Robber Adventure is an addictive game with simple gameplay that you must tap the screen to jump over the obstacle and run to get. The finally to this game is the

OBJECTIVES
* Achieve the best distance on the leaderboard
* Dont Die

FEATURES
* See how far up the leaderboards you can climb by running through our constantly evolving world
* Multiple characters to unlock
* Frequent Updates to provide fresh new content several times a week
* Watch out for quicksand, moving tiles, and other unique obstacles
* Tap to Jump
* FREE!

It's amazing arcade style adventure game with endless running game.

So are you ready to run?

Download Now...
